document.full_text: war crimes defendant radovan karadzic was bumped from his usual courtroom and his spot on closed-circuit television at the hague tribunal on friday by his former partner ratko mladic.
document.title: karadzic bumped by mladic from main hague court
lines_and_colors: war crimes defendant radovan karadzic was bumped from his usual courtroom and his spot on closed-circuit television at the hague tribunal on friday by his former partner ratko mladic.
